src:
Fotoreportaj: Toshkent metropoliteni 42 yoshga to‘ldi

07 Nov 2019, 09:35

6-noyabr kuni Toshkent metropoliteni ishga tushganiga 42 yil to‘ldi. “Daryo” fotomuxbiri uchta yo‘nalish bo‘yicha 29 bekatdan iborat Toshkent metropolitenining ajoyib suratlarini to‘plab taqdim etdi.


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

Toshkent metrosining “Chilonzor” liniyasida 12 ta bekat ishlab turibdi, yaqin kelajakda ularning soni kamida ikkitaga ko‘payishi mumkin (liniya TTZ avtoshohbekatiga qadar olib boriladi).


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

Toshkent metropolitenining Alisher Navoiy bekati 2014-yilda dunyodagi eng chiroyli metro bekatlari ro‘yxatidan joy olgan.


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

“O‘zbekiston” yo‘nalishi esa 1984—1991-yillarda qurilib, foydalanishga topshirilgan yo‘nalishda hozircha 11 ta bekat mavjud.


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

Mavzuga doir: Toshkent metropoliteni — bekatlarining nomi juda ko‘p o‘zgargan yerosti saroyi


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

Toshkent metrosi uchun yo‘lovchilarni tetiklashtirish va tinchlantirish imkonini beruvchi yoritish tizimiga ega bo‘lgan 45 ta poyezd xarid qilish rejalashtirilmoqda.


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

Mavzuga doir: Toshkent yer usti halqa metro yo‘lida harakatlanuvchi yangi poyezdlar taqdimoti bo‘lib o‘tdi


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”

“Yunusobod” yo‘nalishi esa 2001-yil 24-oktabrda dastlabki olti bekat — “Mingo‘rik”, “Yunus Rajabiy”, “Abdulla Qodiriy”, “Minor”, “Bodomzor”, “Habib Abdullayev” nomlari bilan foydalanishga topshirilgan.


Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”



Foto: Madina Nurman / “Daryo”
text:
Photo report: Tashkent underground turns 42 years old

07 Nov 2019, 09:35

It is 42 years since the Tashkent underground was launched on November 6. The River River photographer has presented some of the stunning photos of the Tashkent underground with 29 stops in three directions.


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

There are 12 stations on the Chilanzar line of the Tashkent underground, and their number may increase by at least two times in the near future (the line will run to the TTZ bus station).


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

The Alisher Navoi station in Tashkent is included in the list of the most beautiful underground stations in the world in 2014.


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

The route "Uzbekistan" was built in 1984-1991 and has 11 stations.


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

Topic: Tashkent Underground - Underground Palace


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

It is planned to purchase 45 trains with metering system, which will allow to refresh and calm passengers.


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

Topic: New Railway Subway Trains Presented in Tashkent


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”

The Yunusabad route was commissioned on October 24, 2001, with the first six stations - "Mingorik", "Yunus Rajabi", "Abdulla Kadiri", "Minor", "Bodomzor", "Habib Abdullayev".


Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”



Photo: Madina Nurman / “River”
